About the Team.Where is the team based?: Our team is distributed across the U.S., Singapore, Vietnam, and Thailand — a true Web3-native setup. More detailed team information will be shared soon. Stay tuned by following our updates!
About the Team.Where can I find fundraising information: Our $2.1M pre-seed round was recently announced. You can read more in this article: The Block - ARO Network Raises $2.1M
About the Team.Are tokenomics available?: Tokenomics will be announced later — stay tuned! However, 5% of the total token supply is allocated for all Jade distributions to the community before TGE.

About Nodes.Can one IP support multiple nodes?: Yes, one IP can support multiple nodes. Just make sure your upload speed can handle it. Rewards depend on bandwidth and performance. An ARO Pod supports up to 100 Mbps, and you can run more if your network allows.
About Nodes.Why hasn’t my ARO Lite node earned anyth: Rewards are calculated hourly. If your network is stable, you should start seeing rewards within 1–2 hours. If your network frequently disconnects or changes IP, rewards may be delayed.
About Nodes.Why am I online, but my node shows low r: At this stage, we're only using a small fraction of your bandwidth to test network connectivity. Current rewards displayed are virtual and not final — they're for reference only.
About Nodes.Which port is the ARO Client listening t: We’ll update documentation with this soon — please check back.
About Nodes.My node doesn’t show up / says 'not adde: If you're using a mobile browser with extensions, it may not be supported. We’re working on support for this — stay tuned!
About Nodes.Is there a tutorial for running the ARO: Yes! You can find the full guide here: ARO Docs – Software Setup
About Nodes.How can I add more nodes?: Node rewards depend on the bandwidth of each connection. If you can provide different networks (e.g., separate IPs or ISPs), you can deploy multiple nodes and bind them to your account. All active nodes will show up in your dashboard.
About Nodes.Does adding more nodes increase my Jade: During the Previewnet phase, ordering multiple ARO Pods under a single account will earn you more Jades. For running ARO Client or ARO Lite, tasks are only counted once per account per node type. For future phases like Testnet, rewards will scale with the bandwidth and quality of your contribution.
About Nodes.Open ports for different nodes?: The explanations of open ports for ARO Lite/ARO Pod and ARO Link/ARO Client have each been added as a corresponding FAQ at the end of their respective User Guides: https://docs.aro.network/user-guides/software-setup
About Nodes.Why can't I connect to ARO Lite on my ph: Please note that our ARO Lite is currently not fully optimized for mobile browsers. For the best experience, we recommend accessing it via desktop for now. Mobile compatibility updates will be notified to the community.
About Nodes.How to install node in my MAC/Windows/Li: ARO Client is a software image designed for X86 architectures, focused on Linux. You would need a virtual machine environment. Tutorial: https://docs.aro.network/user-guides/software-setup. Community reference: https://youtu.be/JDxlfBEEvIE
About Nodes.Lite node disconnection: If you encounter connection issues with ARO Lite, remove the current plugin and reinstall version 0.0.4. Or go to Browser → Extensions, find ARO Lite, toggle the switch off and on to reconnect.
About Nodes.Why is there so much difference between: Very limited impact on your internet experiences for lite node.

About Jade.What is the Redeem Code for, and when wi: Redeem codes will be used in future campaigns and special events. They’ll be released soon!
About Jade.Is there a limit to how much Jade you ca: There isn’t an exact number right now because it depends on your referrer. Example: buying 10 pods or referring 1,000 people affects daily Jade earned.
About Jade.After manually downloading the latest ve: The PreviewJade shown in any node is virtual and not actual mining rewards. Real mining will begin once Testnet starts. Old accumulated Jade still exists virtually.

Others.How can I earn rewards for content contr: We’ll be launching various community activities and content creation contests soon — with Jade rewards. The first campaign may go live as early as next week.
